title: Off Grid Hawaiian Jungle Paradise
text:
Big Room have to get the deluxe. Comes with private shower, refrigerator and lots of space. 

The entire place is off grid if your interested and has an interesting rain water collection system and solar off grid with back up generator system.

We were very comfortable and saw many animals like pigs, a huge Hawaiian snail and we also were able to cook outside and make a fire. Molly was the house keeper and she is there to make sure everything is okay. Be prepared it’s a jungle not like a resort.

title: Lovely hotel with rude spa staff
text:
Everything in the hotel is lovely, starting from the location to the cleanliness of the rooms and value for money .. the concierge staff are super helpful and everyone makes effort to please you... the swimming pool is part if the spa... most unprofessional and rude staff ( all 3 that I saw).. they start with a must buy shower cap which ends up to be purely made out of cloth.. total ripoff, then the fact that you have to go to the swimming pool are in their bath robes only which seems like a rule they apply only to people they want to torture!
Avoid the spa.. everything else is great

title: Don’t use booking
text: I booked a hotel through booking, and it said that I had until a certain date to cancel the reservation. I called two days before that date to cancel because the weather was going to be bad in the area. I was told that they would still charge me regardless of what I was told on the site. I even offered to send proof that I had until the date to cancel, but they said no. I asked for a manager and the manager hung up on me. So, I decided to go ahead and cancel and never use them again, but after I called back they left me on hold for nearly 3 hours. All I called to do was cancel and get a confirmation email. Please don’t use them I feel that my incident was borderline fraudulent activity, and I WILL NEVER use them again. They barely deserve one star.

title: Bad, bad service!
text: I’ve stayed at this hotel many times before, I like the comfort and price however, I was extremely disappointed this time around. We arrived and had no hot water for the entire day and half of the following day!!!! My kids and I had to shower with extreme freezing water! My daughter didn’t want to bathe the following day because she was afraid of taking a shower with cold water! My son was just getting over a cold and has asthma... I went to speak to the receptionist and wanted them to switch us rooms or offer some kind of refund but they said they couldn’t do anything about it... really?! Other guests were also complaining and they didn’t do much to help! Unbelievable!!! I don’t know if I would be staying here again!!!! Was one of my favorites, not anymore!

title: Terrible
text:
This was the fourth time we have stayed at the Santorini Palace hotel going back to 1998. We always enjoyed the beautiful location overlooking the Caldera, free parking, the swimming pool, and amazing service. 
Our last stay just two weeks ago was awful. The hotel evidently had been purchased by a hotel chain catering to large tour groups. 
The front desk personnel were unpleasant and downright rude. The lovely lobby bar had been renovated, but sadly, according to the manager, was never to be open because they did not have a bartender for it. The great service was gone and in its place was a hotel that cared little for the individual. They served breakfast, but you had to get your own coffee. Kleenex was no longer supplied in the rooms, nor was water even though we were told to drink bottled water because Santorini water was not potable. Water was charged to our rooms. 
Some of what I have said would lead one to think that we were too picky. The sad thing is that the cost per night was very high compared to other visits, yet the wonderful service had disappeared. 
Never again...

I will no longer recommend the Santorini Palace to any of my friends.

title: Best views and service in all Giza
text:
Mamlouk has been our home away from home in these two weeks traveling Egypt. The staff has been amazing and so very accommodating with our group. We’ve enjoyed eating at the terrace with the beautiful pyramid views. 

Reda, the manager specially went out of his way to accommodate our group of 10 and provide us with everything we requested, from special room accommodations to keeping our luggage while we traveled 

We will definitely be back. This is great hotel for groups!

title: Nice overall, beware of construction
text: We had a nice room for the money and the staff was friendly. Construction in the main lobby-literally has to walk on the work in progress as the floor in had been torn up and was being replaced. Construction workers were in and out-enjoying some adult beverages in their down time. Made me uncomfortable to know these people were operating machinery and were in and of our hotel all through the night. It was noisy and dirty and unsafe for my small children. I never would have booked this room had I know construction was taking place. It should have been disclosed before we booked.

title: Inconvenience
text: The property itself was absolutely wonderful and for a great value, but when we got there we found out that the condo had been double booked. This was a severe inconvenience to us considering the rude staff/housekeeping and the relocation to a lesser condo. I literally got out of the shower and the staff had let themselves in to clean, and i was forced to kick them out till we had cleaned up our bags and put clothes on. After speaking with the owner i agreed to relocate on the condition that i could get a refund. I have not gotten a refund yet today. When i arrived at the new condo it was filthy and me and my group had to wait for the staff to finish cleaning the other condo before they made it to our new. The whole situation was just extended disappointing.

title: Fun area!
text:
My friend and I were in StL for the Billy Joel concert and all downtown hotels were booked out for a convention. We planned to shop in Brentwood the next day - so this was perfect!
The hotel is very clean and our room was spacious.  Parking was free. There are quite a few fun eateries in the area. There is a Houlihan’s right across the parking lot. We hit their happy hour on the way to the concert - 1/2 price drinks and appetizers.
The hotel is tucked back behind the shopping centers so we had to use our GPS 😎.  
This hotel is basic - no restaurant or bar - but Houlihan’s is literally steps from the front door.
Free breakfast was good - hot entrees - well stocked!  We will be back’

title: Great Place to Stay
text: This was a super comfortable motel with comfortable beds, a selection of pillows and cold air! Also a clean, hot spa, a cool, refreshing pool and best of all a Super Breakfast! And hats off to the young man (his name starts with Ur, but I forgot the rest) taking care of the food and eating area. It was deliciously hot, great variety and pristine clean! I watched him as he constantly wiped countertops, tables and chairs down. He was sure to wipe the top of the chairs where patrons grab the chair to pull out and sit down. If I’m ever this way again we will stop again!! He deserves a raise and promotion!

title: Our stay
text:
We really enjoyed our stay here the staff was so friendly and helpful. They also arranged our transfer from the cruise ship back to the airport. It’s a perfect place to stay it’s so close to the Cruise port. You can walk to the bus then they carry you to the ship. 
There are a lot of restaurants around it was great. 
It’s a lovely place with a great view of the city overlooking the sea.  Lots of restaurants right below to eat and food was great. 
I’m trying to find out how to upload some pictures. 
The Garcia’s

title: They Answer the Phone!
text:
Of all the apps for making reservations this is the best. It’s easy to make the reservations and it’s easy to cancel them. I accidentally booked a nonrefundable room and canceling would’ve cost me over $1700. I called customer service and told him what happened and they were able to cancel it for me at no charge.
     The only improvement I would like to see is the distance for walking to nearby attractions. They do this on Expedia. So I’m sure it would be an easy add.

title: Always has the best prices
text: Im shocked at the fact that this app actually does have the best prices around. Its super easy and fun to use. It also has rewards. I tell people about it all the time. In fact, as I was standing in line at a hotel, a couple was trying to check in. They did not have the app and the prices were given was $40 more than what I paid. I had to tell them so they download the app right then in there and got a better price. You guys are wonderful thank you.

title: Issue with the Latino owners
text:
Actually just a bedroom rented from on-site landlords.
The husband called me after I left and told me in his VERY poor English that I took 4 bath towels. He stated they were in the room I rented. They were not. He said he left them so I could take a shower. I told him I didn’t take a shower because there were no towels. He replied-in his broken English- that I did take them and he is reporting me. 
No further charges are authorized by me to the same merchant pending payment for $92.
I did not steal anything and resent his threats.

title: DEA in Sorrento / review by Rafael and Mildred
text:
Before I begin to write down this review let me tell you that the last vacation in Europe was our fifth vacation trip and never before, in our stays in hotels or hostels we had a superb attention and personal dedication as the one given to us by Herman on Dea Guest House in Sorrento, he answered and solved all our 

questions and concerns since the first day until the last day, he get us a taxi when we needed it and even we booked an excursion with him to Capri for a very  good price. He is a friendly person. 

The apartment is modern and very clean, the bathroom has every feature and the air conditioning work perfectly! 

We strongly recommend to rent his apartment with confidence you won’t regret beside it’s beautiful, it’s clean and very centric with a beautiful view from the balcony to the Corso Italia one of the best street of Sorrento we will do it again!

title: Safe and EZ app to use
text: It's a save and easy app to use. Also accurate with many price options to chose from. I booked a nice hotel in Santorini, Greece from New Jersey, USA two weeks before traveling. Everything in Santorini was in order. No room arrangement problems and no payment issues. Then booked another 2 different hotels for different dates while in Santorini for Athens. Again no issues with many hotel options. This is the third time I've used this app. this year. Recommend.

title: Trash on customer complaints, no action, horrible
text:
Hotel charged me with a higher price that I booked from this app. The price advertised in this app should be the price charged to me but it was not. I talked to the hotel. I talked to booking app customer service support and have a ticket on their file. Long follow up short, I still don’t have my refund from the September 2019 complaint either from the hotel or from booking app.

Y’all be careful. It was my first time using the app. A friend recommended it. It’s fancy and easy to use but when it comes to prices, ya need to double triple check with your hotel before ya agree to swipe that card because ya can’t always trust the prices here and hotel would always say, they’re third party and hotel price would always be correct.

title: Hopefully you don’t have any problems.
text: I/my husband have called (booking) multiple times to get our money back from a hotel we didn’t even stay at because they didn’t give us the correct room. Last phone call booking said it would be refunded don’t worry. Well it’s been a week and still NO refund! It’s been almost a month since our “check in” date. How ridiculous. I also would recommend staying away from Hampton because apparently the manager is NEVER in and have made multiple phone calls with no results - we have yet to even TALK to a manager. Employees always say they will let them know ...... I just want my money back. I don’t think that’s to much to ask since we didn’t even stay there & was told we would NOT be charged.

title: Not even ONE star worthy!
text:
Twice I have used this app, and twice I have had issues! First everything was awesome right up until I got the final confirmation from you! I looked it over and the date of the reservation had changed from two weeks in the future to that same night! I had to call the hotel directly to get it straightened out (thankfully they were staffed by REAL LIVING BREATHING PEOPLE). 
This time I was attempting to book a room (king bed, non smoking, two adults) and being very leery I double checked before I hit confirm. Good thing I didn’t go any farther because I was suddenly booking BOTH a double with 2 queen bed AND the king with no way to remove the one I didn’t want in the first place!
Taking this app OFF my phone as you can only ATTEMPT to rip me off twice!

title: Beware of Booking through this App
text:
I had booked a stay in New York apartment through this app. The apartment never charged my credit card and i kept on getting messages that credit card was declined. I gave them the proof on call but still no action was taken. I had to call them 6-7 times but they kept on saying that they will followup with apartment. Just a day before my booking, i got a cancellation email and when contacted them no one helped me with new booking. There was no followup from their customer service team on this issue and i always had to make a call and got a same reply that they will followup with apartment until i got cancellation mail.

The customer service was the worst ever that i had to face and they dis not even consider rebooking for me. They were hosting a bogus apartment on their portal and did not take any necessary action to help me rebook.

I was told to get a proof from the bank that thye did not decline credit card. The bank could not give it immediately but i got a letter in a week.

BEWARE IF THIS APP WHEN YOU BOOK AS I HAD TO GO THROUGH A REALLY BAD EXPERIENCE FACING THEIR CUSTOMER SERVICE EXPERTS.
Wish i could rate them in negative.

title: Great location and beautiful place stay
text: I give this place 10 stars if I could we travel a lot this is one our favorite places walking distances to everything will definitely stay again rooms were beyond clean bathrooms were nice breakfast was great hot good variety of food and drinks electric went out few hours but they were right on getting it turned on we went about our plans went out eat went to pool and the pool was amazing have nothing at all bad to say!

title: Solid app
text: This is how I book hotel rooms now. It’s super easy and convenient. My only issue is that sometimes there may be a problem and booking can’t tell me what the issue is, it just says contact the hotel. I was unaware my CC had been replaced so the old number I had was invalid. After I reentered the card number everything looked ok, but my reservation was canceled. That’s my only issue but I guess technically it was my fault. I just would have liked to know and I didn’t let that one experience dock any stars from my review.

title: Best stay if you need to catch a flight in Chumphon!
text: It’s far from the city but super close to the airport. The rooms are all new, our room was very clean, bed and shower super comfortable! The owner manages the place and she is a sweetheart! Treated us super well, made sure we had everything we needed and arranged everything for our flight in the morning, she charges extra to take you to the airport, but super worth it! I wish we stayed one more night to know the place better, super charming and you get thAt local experience! Definitely recommend it!

title: must have app!
text: Whether you travel every once and while or several times a year this is the BEST app to have!! Has tools to help you narrow down the best possible hotel that will suit you and yours! Breaks down by district and shows you surrounding things near by. Let’s you filter hotels for things like free parking and free breakfast. Or my favorite “free cancellation” which allows you to book the hotel NOW but pay at property when you go! Use this every time we travel. And they have hotels all around the world. Thanks for helping me to make EVERY vay Kay amazing!!

title: First bad experience when using Booking
text: I had issues with this trip, which was the first time I’ve ever had issues. The hotel tried to give me a room much smaller then I reserved (even though I was charged the amount for the bigger room) then tried to blame the mix up on Booking. I was then told, had I called the hotel directly to reserve my room, my rate would have been $40 less than with Booking. I’m not sure what they were saying was true, since the hotel staff tried to lie and cover there mistakes from the beginning but next time I travel, I will make a call to the hotel to see if the rates are less than through booking.

title: Reliable app
text: I had plans to go to Texas & I booked my hotel 2 months in advance. The payment process was simple & they sent me a confirmation email with all the information I’d need, as well as follow up email to keep me posted on if any changes would be made. I had to cancel my plans on going & I clicked the cancel booking button, it was a very simple process & they're sending my money back as of right now without any hassle. Very simple, effective, & reliable booking app

title: Great Boutique Hotel with Superb Location!
text: We stayed at Renoma Hotel in 2019 and loved it. We returned for another stay of 10 days and love it even more! We have been riding the Renoma bikes(free)  all over town and in particular we enjoy riding on the areas near the beach. The trails are designated for bike riders and go on for miles north and south. The hotel staff has been exceptional and have taken care of all of our needs with smiles on their faces!!  The bakery and restaurant in the hotel are among the best in Tel Aviv. And we are only a few feet from the Beach!!😎

title: Works better than I expected!
text:
I searched according to price and read the reviews until I learned how to restrict the locations I got returns all over Houston. It seems to cover all the hotel chains and I did see one small family owned motel where I like to stay when I’m closer. This app makes reservations for you instead of sending you to other sites to work through their algorithms, which I detest. 
Anyway, it shows plenty of options to choose from so with a bit of forethought you can find a place you’ll like. Enjoy.

title: Ramada Encore is the best!!! Staff are great
text: We booked 19 nights and ate breakfast nearly 14 days and the few days we went to ther restaurants to compare and the others aren’t any better at all! We didn’t get bacon at another place we ate but the facilities are nearly perfect and better than par… I would recommend this place on a score of 1-10… 8.5 the bad was the menu was on paper which we couldn’t read so we ate out food delivery every other night and there is a shopwise right across the street

title: Girls weekend
text:
Good: Lobby was stunning, the girl that I checked in with was super nice, beds were comfy, room was huge and shower was amazing.
Bad: The room had a very strong odor of marijuana and cigarette smoke, we found toenails/fingernails on the carpet along with food debris next to the bed, sticky stuff on the table that was between the beds, tv was very dirty-u could see a film on it, there was ashes on the hardwood floor leading to the bathroom, toilet was not clean, the counter in the bathroom was not clean and had toothpaste splatters all over it, room was not sound proof, ppl with kids on our floor were up before 7 in the morning slamming their door numerous times and running around the halls. Not in a great area of Madison. Would not stay again.

title: Hotel Regal
text: I don’t normally take the time to leave in length reviews as I know I should. But I wanted to say that this hotel makes me feel at home, the beds are comfortable, everything about it works, and is perfect for me. I travel all over the world and I can’t say enough good about this place. The people, the food, the location, the bed, the bathroom, the modern upgrades. Everything about it works and works well, I could live at this place. And the price really feels like a bargain. Lovely place!

title: Just Like Staying In A Hotel!
text:
When I think B&B I think oh great someone’s home.  I’m always worried about bed bugs and just dirty rooms etc...

Not one time did I think that when me, my husband and our service dog spirit stayed at Charlotte’s!!

From the booking to the last day of our stay.  Nothing but excellent customer service.  To be honest we felt as if we came to visit a friend and they put us up in one of their guest rooms.  

Toiletries like a hotel, quality towels like a hotel, beautiful view of the sea and less than 2-3 minute walk to the beach. 

A/C was awesome and much needed during this hot time of the year. Lol!

Charlotte was even kind enough to provide vegan options for us!!  I mean she truly pays attention to detail and embraced us like family.  

We messaged her back and forth on WhatsApp.  She was awesome!!

I’d give 10 stars if I could. 
Loved our stay and definitely booking again!!

Thank You!!

title: Gem of a hotel
text:
I’ve stayed at hotels around the world and always give a cheer when I find a hotel like Puedra Andina. Perched on a hill (yes, the walk is substantial) outside of the crowds in Copacabana, there are no shortages of terraces, balconies and decks where you can enjoy the views of Lake Titicaca to Peru and beyond. 

The architecture is quirky but in an artistic way. Attention to detail is everywhere. And the staff bends over backwards to make you happy. And the value here is CRAZY great. 

They could write a book on how to run a small hotel.  Worth booking ahead for.

title: Do not use this app at all!!!
text: I booked my Christmas vacation back in July, I called more than 4 times to confirm my booking, and to ask questions about if they had a blender and dumb things like that, so we drove 15 hours to our rental on Dec 22 to find out someone else was there, I doubled checked my booking because I thought I made a mistake, and I called booking they pretty much told me to get away from the house and that I had to pay a different rental, they refunded me the money in 10 days but I’m so glad we did have money to pay a different place i just didn’t like how they couldn’t even get me a different house, if I paid the day I booked I expected them to pay to fix this problem, I’m definitely going to sue them, it was the worst experience in my life.

title: Please don't book with this company!!!
text: I booked a hotel with this company on their app....it didn't say anywhere at all that it was non refundable then I get my confirmation email saying if I cancel they will charge me for it.  Also it had good reviews on their app I get online and it had terrible reviews!  Long story short I didn't dare cancel so we went we drove 8 hours telling the kids they can swim when we get there and we arrive the pool is broken and the girl at the front desk said it's been months I has only booked this 3 weeks before!  The room was not ready when it was supposed to be, it was filthy, and it was sooo hot and the air conditioner didn't work!!! It was an awful start to our vacation and I hope this stops anyone from using this awful company!!

title: Not at all happy with this hotel!!!!!
text:
My 11 year old and 13 year old daughters and I stayed here from Thursday to Sunday. I booked online requesting a king bed, the owner say well I just assumed that you would need 2 double beds. My girls don’t feel comfortable sleeping away from me when we travel which is why I booked it for a king bed. He promised to change my room, then booked it to another family! He offered to change it yet again...........hours before I checked out. My girls and I shared a full size bed our entire stay. To make matters worse their maid service took my cream colored wash clothes mistaking them for their “white” wash clothes......seriously?!?! I haven’t gotten them back!! 
This is not a hotel that I would ever return to even if they were allowing my family to stay for free!!!

title: Very responsive host!!
text: Very nice people manage this property. We loved the view and the location was nice. It’s not in the heart of the city but it has such amazing views of the Douro River it makes up for it. Could use a few more basic condiments for cooking but the kitchen is quite nice. We had sufficient coffee and that was good. Could have used a few extra towels and really needs a dehumidifier or something at the entrance to minimize the mildew smells. That hurts the overall feeling of what we considered a nice property. Not sure what can be done about that. Thanks for all your responses Ricardo!

title: Noury family
text: We had a lovely stay at the BQ guest house .we ari. Early and we’re able to check in early  The room was very clean and had two lovely balconies that let light  and fresh air in the morning with a peek view of the St angelus Castell. Breakfast was delicious bufet and cappuccino that we brought to our room for covit . Very nice neighborhood just blocks to the  St Peter’s cathedral . 2 gelaterias and a carrefour  mini maker on the corner. Also trattoria casare close by is a Michelin restaurant . Parking  below the park about 4 blocks . Hope to come back again

title: Why the hidden pet fee
text: I just made a reservation at a hotel after going through different hotels to make a reservation at. I saw at the one I made a reservation at from one of the questions that pets are free to stay, but after I placed my reservation, I was notified that there is a $25 per night fee to bring a pet with my group. Plus, they only say that pets are welcome with no notification on how much it is per night to bring a pet with you to the hotel. If the hotel say that pets are welcome to the hotel, the hotel NEEDS to state how much it is for a pet per night, not said how much AFTER making reservations.

title: DELETING BOOKING
text: This was my last straw with booking. I’ve had a few bad hotels where I don’t get the room I think I booked and I’ve had managers tell me it’s because I booked through a third party but this last stay I had someone come into my room 3 TIMES because their system said the room was vacant even though I was booked for 3 days through booking. Cleaning lady told me I needed to talk to manager and they had me down for 4 nights when I spoke to them. Still doesn’t make sense for why the cleaning lady had came in the room never got an answer for it but happened all 3 days. And now I’m wondering if the $500 I paid for 3 nights was actually for 4? Since that’s what they had me down for. I’m never using booking again.

title: Nice Spot
text: The owner communicated with us every step of the way after booking her place. Very responsive by text and phone. The apartment has number keypad for self check in/out. Apartment is clean and beautifully decorated. Owner provided clean towels and basket of essentials in the kitchen and bathroom for us. Owner provides parking pass and key fob for access in and out of all doors in the complex. We also visited the pool, it was nice and clean. We will definitely recommend this place and stay here again! Thank you for your hospitality.

title: Useful app
text: Easy for booking, for managing booking some options are easy to use (like free cancellation before a given date); adding guests may be tricky - if the app doesn’t allow it, you can try contacting customer services. As the customer services line kept me on hold for a long time (it’s the summer holidays), I decided to do a second booking with my updated needs and the  cancel my first booking, free of charge (as done before a given date). It seems to have worked.

title: Lovely Home
text:
The house was amazing and the location is great.   It was very clean, well furnished, and the kitchen is huge.   The host, Antonio, had food coffee and beer set out for us upon our arrival at after 11:00 pm.  It was so nice to have some basics already there as most stores close at 8-9 pm.  The surf beaches are with a 10 minute drive, the waterfront boardwalk is within 5 minutes and supermarkets are within 3 minutes.    

One of the coolest parts of the house it the private courtyard.  It felt like we were in old Europe on our own estate.   It was a real treat for some North Americans.

title: Good location and value
text: We stayed for 3 days. The owners were very nice and accommodating. Kitchen in the room made it easy for breakfasts and lunches in the room. The pool was great and my kids loved it. There was a shallow side for the kids. The beach was a close walk one block away and close to all the fun stuff on the boardwalk. It’s an old school hotel with the ash trays outside of the rooms, but I think that’s just wildwood in general. One bad thing was that we left our son’s swimmies out to dry and they disappeared so I’m guessing someone took them which is not cool :( everything else was good.

title: One of the best apps but...
text: It’s rare but today and yesterday neither app nor mobile web version does not allowed to save the hotels to make some preferable list. Moreover, the links shared with friends don’t open the hotel or to say more correctly the proper hotels are showed but the downloading process doesn’t stop and you cannot check properties. It makes the app inconvenient to use for find some appropriate accommodation. But, like I said generally everything connecting with booking works correctly that is why it is just a signal to the team that is something wrong.

title: Pay with Wallet
text: I have been trying to book a room using my credit by choosing a hotel on this site that shows you can Pay with Wallet.   However, finalizing my booking using this option doesn’t work.   I get a message saying invalid form and that my cc is not good.   When I booked the same room and did not use the Pay with Wallet option the booking went through.   After calling and emailing numerous times the issue still isn’t resolved. If you offer an option then it should be accessible.   I’m wondering if it’s intentional so they can pretend to refund your money and put it in your “Wallet” but have no intention of letting you access your credit.  Very frustrating and perhaps a bit devious.  Expedia is much more user friendly.

title: Great Hotel! ☺️
text:
I absolutely love this hotel, it is my go to hotel every time I go to Florida. I have visited this hotel more than 4 times and every time it has been a great experience. 

The location of the hotel is the best as it is a Universal hotel, it makes everything just so much more smooth with the shuttles to and from Universal. Icon park is close and so much other places are so close it really helps. The food, cafe, and the staff are all GREAT! We didn’t need to rent a car as we just Ubered everywhere ($6-10) or took the shuttles to Universal for free.

The ambient is very Family friendly. The rooms are updated and always clean and well kept. 

I also like the fact most of the staff speaks Spanish as my family is mostly Spanish speaking that helped ALOT! 

Again, I highly recommend this hotel to all my friends and family!

title: Warning! Do not rent from Airpads!
text:
Airpads. No maid service, no clean towels, no clean sheets. No toilet paper refill, no soap/shampoo refills. Family of four on vacation for 11 days. Had no warning about not having any services until check in. Which took an hour when we got there because they did not have our reservation and had to call Airpads to fax over. Very unprofessional service. The savings you receive from using Airpads are not worth having to use the same towels and sheets for 11 days.I asked a maid for toilet paper and they said they could not give me any because the room was privately owned. We then had to go to walmart to purchase our own products. Soap, shampoo and conditioner , toilet paper and towels for the beach.
Will never use Airpads again.
Very disappointed customers.

title: Great location and nice space
text: We loved bellagio and appreciated that we were in the heart of it.  The beds and pillows were very comfortable and the wi-fi worked great.  The pictures on the site were accurate and the host was very attentive even though we never met in person.  If you are a light sleeper or a napper this may not be the place for you though.  It’s above a restaurant and the bell tower goes off early in the morning.  I think at 8am, 8:30am, and 9am I think. It didn’t bother us, we took melatonin/Advil pm to help.

title: Cozy and Spacious 1BR Apartment - Rimal 3 JBR
text: An excellent location in the middle of the Jumeirah Beach area .. The apartment is clean and equipped with all the necessary needs, in addition to good Wi-Fi and easy access.  The building is secured by the garage with the guard at the reception.  All the needs are available around the building from the supermarket and restaurants, and it is also very close to the public and free beach .. I have only one negative thing, the owner of the apartment should have put new sheets and pillow covers to be more comfortable for the customer
